message: computer does not detect keyboard and trackpad, I already tried another trackpad and ipd cable, problem persists.

Same problem before and after enter to macOS?
Can you acces boot menu?
it's always the same problem before and after, I can't access the boot menu, enter the user directly and the cursor doesn't move there, and neither does the keyboard
Check J4800 voltage; pins 1, 10, 14, 19.

3.4v  pin1
1.9v. pin10
5.1v pin 14
3.41v pin 19v
Change R4830...

change R4830 pin 10 2.4v
PP3V3_S5=3.3v PP3V3_S4=2.4v, change u8000 because it is physically damaged, problem persists
What is 3V3_S4 voltage with trackpad disconnected?
I measured those values with the trackpad disconnected, only with the board

U8000 gets S4_PWR_EN?
If yes, check diode mode to ground at R8000 pads.

S4_PWR_EN=3.3v
diode mode to ground at R8000=0.39

Change again U8000.
Be sure to get good solders...

Ok, change again u8000 and then 3V3_S4=2.5v
PP3V3_S5=3.3v
Bypass U8000 and check if 3V3_S5 also drops.
disculpe cuando se refiere a bypass u8000, se refiere que quite u8000 y que haga una union con un cable 3V3_S4 a 3V3_S5

No hace falta quitar el chip.
Si notas algo raro, entonces si mejor quitarlo.
bypass u8000, then 3V3_S5=3.3v

So you have now correct 3V3_S4 too.
What is the actual symptom?
The board boots, check something more?
if it turns on and the trackpad works, can I leave it with bypass? strange why does this happen, yes I changed u8000 2 times?
This implies 3V3_S4 presence in off state, with charger connected.
So what do I do about it?
Check the current consumption in off state, with charger connected.

cuando se refiere off state, es el computador apagado conectado a la bateria?, y para medir el consumo de corriente lo hago conectando la fuente de poder al equipo y mirando valor display de la fuente?

Apagado, con cargador, pero sin bateria.
Asi descartas la corriente de carga bateria.
Interesa saber solo el consumo de la placa.

Alimenta con la fuente de laboratorio, claro.
Compara el consumo con un equipo perfectamente funcional.
